resources.string: Ugomba kwemerera uruhushya rwaho kugirango Securitly ikore
Securitly ikeneye kumenya aho uherereye igihe cyose

Urashaka gushoboza aho uherereye?
Jya kuri Igenamiterere -> Porogaramu -> Securitly -> Buri gihe wemere umwanya.

Noneho ongera utangire Securitly
Ohereza ubutumwa bwihutirwa mugihe urwego rwa bateri ari
Uzi neza ko ushaka gusubiramo amakuru asanzwe?
Urashaka gusiba iyi contact kurutonde rwawe?

1. Securitly ikeneye kumenya aho uherereye igihe cyose. Kugirango ukore ibyo, jya kumurongo wigikoresho cyawe -> porogaramu -> Securitly -> Uruhushya kandi uhindure uruhushya rwaho kugirango "Emerera igihe cyose".
2.Ntugahatire gufunga Securitly. Bitabaye ibyo, ubutumwa bwihutirwa ntabwo buzoherezwa kuri konti yawe.
3. Ntabwo dusaba ko washyiraho urwego rwa bateri uzohereza ubutumwa bwihutirwa kuri 1 cyangwa 2%, kuko igikoresho cyawe gishobora kuzimya mbere yo kohereza ubutumwa.

Iyi porogaramu yakozwe n’abanyeshuri 5 bo mu kigo cy’ikoranabuhanga cya Laguna, muri Mexico. Uyu mushinga watangiye nkigitekerezo twiyemeje kugirango dushyire mubikorwa, kandi hamwe numujyanama wacu, injeniyeri Gerardo, twabishobotse. Hamwe niyi porogaramu turizera gutanga umusanzu muke mubihe byisi.

Igikoresho cyanjye cya nyuma cyari:
ubunini:
40.776570
uburebure: -73.969979
Parike Nkuru Iburengerazuba Amateka
New York, 10024, EE. UU.
Securitly ntishobora gukora kuko uruhushya "Kohereza SMS" ntiruhabwa
Securitly ntishobora gukora kuko "Burigihe Ahantu" uruhushya ntiruhabwa. Securitly ikeneye kumenya aho uherereye kugirango irashobora kohereza ahantu haheruka kumenyekana kubo wahisemo
Habayeho kwibeshya kubona iki gikoresho cyagereranijwe
Ntugaragaze "ahantu hasabwa" hagaragara iyo Securitly itangiye
